name: Honored Amongst the Clan
tooltip:
Honored Amongst the Clan

It is good to see you again, <class>. I had not expected you to return. Alas, you have proven yourself a brave and honorable soldier of the Frostwolf.

Your time has come again, <name>. You have earned a new ranking and as such, a new insignia denoting this rise in stature.

Present your insignia.

Requirements:
- Frostwolf Insignia Rank 2
